title: Blessing for successful CHOGM
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – (pix by: Chandana Perera & Nalin Hewapathirana) A special Ashirvada Pooja to invoke blessings for the success of the oncoming Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting (CHOGM) in Sri Lanka was held at Sri Sambodhi Viharaya in Gregory’s Road, Colombo-7 on Saturday evening (19 Oct)….
